content:
TITLE: Migrating JS Theme Configuration to CSS Variables DESCRIPTION: Example of migrating a JavaScript theme configuration to use CSS variables in Tailwind CSS v4. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` theme('width.1/2') ``` LANGUAGE: CSS CODE: ``` var(--width-1\/2) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: CSS Variable and Function Syntax Examples DESCRIPTION: Examples of CSS variable naming changes and function syntax updates in TailwindCSS 4.0 SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` var(--spacing-1_5) var(--ease-*) var(--container-*) var(--text-*) var(--font-*) var(--tracking-*) var(--leading-*) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Arbitrary Variants in TailwindCSS DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to use the new arbitrary variants feature to apply styles conditionally. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_16 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Colors as Closures in TailwindCSS DESCRIPTION: Allows colors to be defined as closures in the TailwindCSS configuration, enabling dynamic color generation. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_32 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` module.exports = { theme: { colors: { primary: ({ opacityVariable, opacityValue }) => { // Dynamic color logic } } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Relative CSS Files in Tailwind CSS DESCRIPTION: New syntax for importing relative CSS files in Tailwind CSS v4, requiring a relative path prefix. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: CSS CODE: ``` @import './styles.css' ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: CSS Variable Usage Example DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to use CSS variables as arbitrary values using parentheses instead of square brackets syntax. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` bg-(--my-color) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Listing Supported File Extensions for TailwindCSS DESCRIPTION: This code snippet provides a categorized list of file extensions that are compatible with TailwindCSS. It includes extensions for HTML, JavaScript frameworks, templating languages, and various server-side programming languages. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/crates/oxide/src/scanner/fixtures/template-extensions.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` # HTML html pug # Glimmer gjs gts # JS astro cjs cts jade js jsx mjs mts svelte ts tsx vue # Markdown md mdx # ASP aspx razor # Handlebars handlebars hbs mustache # PHP php twig # Ruby erb haml liquid rb rhtml slim # Elixir / Phoenix eex heex # Nunjucks njk nunjucks # Python py tpl # Rust rs ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using CSS Theme Function with Special Characters DESCRIPTION: Example of using the CSS theme() function to reference variables with special characters in Tailwind CSS v4. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: CSS CODE: ``` theme('width.1/2') ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring TailwindCSS Presets DESCRIPTION: Adds a new 'presets' configuration option to TailwindCSS. This allows defining presets that can be used as a base configuration. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_31 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` module.exports = { presets: [ // Presets go here ] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Dark Mode Class in TailwindCSS DESCRIPTION: Allows customizing the class name used for dark mode when using the 'class' strategy. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_15 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` module.exports = { darkMode: ['class', '.custom-dark-mode-class'] } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Advanced Usage of Ignore Crate with WalkBuilder in Rust DESCRIPTION: This advanced example shows how to use the WalkBuilder to customize the behavior of the directory iterator. In this case, it disables the default behavior of ignoring hidden files and directories. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/crates/ignore/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: rust CODE: ``` use ignore::WalkBuilder; for result in WalkBuilder::new("./").hidden(false).build() { println!("{:?}", result); } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Bare Values for Gradient Angles in Tailwind CSS DESCRIPTION: Example of using bare values for linear gradient angles in Tailwind CSS v4. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: CSS CODE: ``` bg-[linear-gradient(45deg,_var(--tw-gradient-stops))] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Variants as Functions in TailwindCSS DESCRIPTION: Enables configuring variants as functions in TailwindCSS, allowing for more dynamic variant generation. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_33 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` module.exports = { variants: { extend: { backgroundColor: ({ after }) => after(['custom-variant']) } } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: TailwindCSS Source Function Syntax DESCRIPTION: New source detection syntax for specifying base paths and disabling automatic detection SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` @tailwind utilities; source(...); source(none); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuration Theme Override Example DESCRIPTION: Example of using @theme directive with default option to override theme values from plugins and JS config files. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: CSS CODE: ``` @theme default { --primary-color: #123456; } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: TailwindCSS Grid Layout Negative Values DESCRIPTION: Added support for negative values in column and row start/end utilities. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` grid-col-start: -1; grid-row-start: -2; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Applying Opacity to Theme Colors in TailwindCSS DESCRIPTION: Shows how to use the new opacity support when referencing colors with the theme function. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_17 LANGUAGE: CSS CODE: ``` .custom-element { color: theme(colors.blue.500 / 75%); } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: TailwindCSS Color Definition with Alpha Value DESCRIPTION: Fixed functionality to support multiple placeholders in a single color definition. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` rgb(var(--color-primary) / ) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: CSS Child Selector Pattern DESCRIPTION: Examples of CSS child selector patterns that can be migrated to newer variant syntax. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` [&>*] ``` LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` [&_*] ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: TailwindCSS Import Syntax Update DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the updated import syntax for TailwindCSS in CSS files. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: CSS CODE: ``` /* Before */ @import "tailwindcss/tailwind.css"; /* After */ @import "tailwindcss"; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: CSS Variable Usage in Arbitrary Values DESCRIPTION: Shows conversion of bare CSS variables to var() syntax in template files. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: CSS CODE: ``` /* Before */ .example { color: --my-color; } /* After */ .example { color: var(--my-color); } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic Usage of Ignore Crate in Rust DESCRIPTION: This example demonstrates the most basic usage of the 'ignore' crate. It recursively traverses the current directory, automatically filtering out files and directories according to ignore globs found in files like .ignore and .gitignore. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/crates/ignore/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: rust CODE: ``` use ignore::Walk; for result in Walk::new("./") { // Each item yielded by the iterator is either a directory entry or an // error, so either print the path or the error. match result { Ok(entry) => println!("{}", entry.path().display()), Err(err) => println!("ERROR: {}", err), } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: TailwindCSS Calc Expression Spacing DESCRIPTION: Fixed spacing issues around calculations in gradients and grid track names when using calc() function. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_14 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` calc(100% - 1rem) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: CSS Variable Usage Example DESCRIPTION: Example showing how color opacity variables are handled in TailwindCSS, specifically the var(--bg-opacity) implementation. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_18 LANGUAGE: CSS CODE: ``` var(--bg-opacity) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: CSS Import URL Example DESCRIPTION: Examples of CSS import statements that are ignored during analysis. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` @import "https://fonts.google.com" ``` LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` @import url("https://fonts.google.com") ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuration File Example DESCRIPTION: Example showing the support for tailwind.config.cjs configuration file in Node ESM projects. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_19 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` tailwind.config.cjs ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting Next.js Development Server using Package Managers (Bash) DESCRIPTION: Provides alternative commands using npm, yarn, pnpm, or bun to run the `dev` script defined in the project's `package.json`. This script typically starts the Next.js development server, making the application accessible locally, usually at http://localhost:3000. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/playgrounds/nextjs/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm run dev # or yarn dev # or pnpm dev # or bun dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding Ignore Crate Dependency in Cargo.toml DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to add the 'ignore' crate as a dependency in a Rust project's Cargo.toml file. It specifies the version 0.4 of the crate. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/crates/ignore/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: toml CODE: ``` [dependencies] ignore = "0.4" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Environment Variable Setting DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to set TAILWIND_MODE environment variable for watch mode. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_20 LANGUAGE: Shell CODE: ``` TAILWIND_MODE=watch ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Project Description and Status Badges in HTML DESCRIPTION: This HTML snippet creates centered paragraphs for the project description and status badges. It includes links to the project's build status, npm package, latest release, and license information. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```

A utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom user interfaces.

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Specifying Tailwind CSS Oxide Binary for macOS x64 DESCRIPTION: This code snippet defines the package name for the Tailwind CSS Oxide binary specifically compiled for macOS (Darwin) on 64-bit x86 architecture. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/crates/node/npm/darwin-x64/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` # `@tailwindcss/oxide-darwin-x64` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Project Description and Status Badges in HTML DESCRIPTION: This HTML snippet creates centered paragraphs for the project description and status badges. It includes links to various project resources and displays badges for build status, downloads, version, and license. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/packages/@tailwindcss-cli/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```

A utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom user interfaces.

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Project Badges in HTML DESCRIPTION: This HTML snippet creates a centered paragraph containing various badges for the Tailwind CSS project. The badges include build status, total downloads, latest release version, and license information, all linked to their respective sources. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/packages/tailwindcss/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Specifying Tailwind CSS Oxide Binary for Linux ARM64 MUSL DESCRIPTION: This code snippet defines the package name for the Tailwind CSS Oxide binary targeting the aarch64-unknown-linux-musl platform. It is used to identify and distribute the correct binary version for ARM64 Linux systems using MUSL libc. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/crates/node/npm/linux-arm64-musl/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` `@tailwindcss/oxide-linux-arm64-musl` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Project Status Badges in HTML DESCRIPTION: This HTML snippet shows various status badges for the Tailwind CSS project, including build status, total downloads, latest release version, and license information. Each badge is linked to its respective source. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/packages/@tailwindcss-browser/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Tailwind CSS Logo with Light/Dark Mode Support in HTML DESCRIPTION: This HTML snippet creates a centered logo for Tailwind CSS with support for light and dark color schemes. It uses the element to provide different logo versions based on the user's color scheme preference. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Tailwind CSS Logo with Dark/Light Mode Support in HTML DESCRIPTION: This HTML snippet creates a centered logo for Tailwind CSS with support for dark and light color schemes. It uses the element to provide different logo versions based on user preferences. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/packages/@tailwindcss-cli/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Tailwind CSS Logo with Dark/Light Mode Support in HTML DESCRIPTION: This HTML snippet creates a centered logo for Tailwind CSS with support for dark and light color schemes. It uses the element to provide different logo versions based on the user's color scheme preference. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/packages/tailwindcss/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Displaying Tailwind CSS Logo with Dark/Light Mode Support in HTML DESCRIPTION: This HTML snippet displays the Tailwind CSS logo with support for dark and light color schemes. It uses the element to provide different logo versions based on the user's color scheme preference. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/packages/@tailwindcss-browser/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: HTML CODE: ```

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: TailwindCSS Version Tag DESCRIPTION: Version marker for release 2.0.0-alpha.23 with date SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_23 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## [2.0.0-alpha.23] - 2020-11-16 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Specifying Tailwind CSS Oxide Binary for Linux x64 musl DESCRIPTION: This code snippet defines the package name for the Tailwind CSS Oxide binary compiled for the x86_64-unknown-linux-musl architecture. It is used to identify and distribute the correct binary version for Linux systems using the musl C library. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/crates/node/npm/linux-x64-musl/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` # `@tailwindcss/oxide-linux-x64-musl` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Specifying TailwindCSS Oxide Binary for Windows x64 DESCRIPTION: This code snippet defines the package name for the Windows 64-bit (x86_64) binary of the TailwindCSS Oxide project. It targets the Microsoft Visual C++ (MSVC) compiler on the Windows platform. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/crates/node/npm/win32-x64-msvc/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` # `@tailwindcss/oxide-win32-x64-msvc` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Specifying Tailwind CSS Oxide Binary for Linux ARM64 GNU DESCRIPTION: This code snippet defines the package name for the Tailwind CSS Oxide binary targeting the aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu architecture. It's used to identify and distribute the correct binary version for Linux ARM64 systems using the GNU toolchain. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/crates/node/npm/linux-arm64-gnu/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` # `@tailwindcss/oxide-linux-arm64-gnu` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Specifying Tailwind CSS Oxide ARM Linux Binary DESCRIPTION: This code snippet defines the package name for the ARM version of Tailwind CSS Oxide, specifically for the armv7-unknown-linux-gnueabihf architecture. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/crates/node/npm/linux-arm-gnueabihf/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` # `@tailwindcss/oxide-linux-arm-gnueabihf` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Specifying TailwindCSS Oxide WASM32-WASI Binary in Markdown DESCRIPTION: This code snippet defines the package name for the WASM32-WASI binary of TailwindCSS Oxide. It specifies that this is the wasm32-wasip1-threads binary version of the @tailwindcss/oxide package. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/crates/node/npm/wasm32-wasi/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: Markdown CODE: ``` # `@tailwindcss/oxide-wasm32-wasi` This is the **wasm32-wasip1-threads** binary for `@tailwindcss/oxide` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Git Ignore Rules for TailwindCSS Project DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines Git ignore rules for a TailwindCSS project. It excludes the .git directory and node_modules folder from version control, which is typical for Node.js based projects to keep the repository size manageable and avoid conflicts. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/crates/oxide/src/scanner/fixtures/ignored-content-dirs.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: gitignore CODE: ``` .git node_modules ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: TailwindCSS Version Comparison Links in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Markdown reference-style links for comparing different versions of TailwindCSS on GitHub. Each link shows the changes between consecutive versions, starting from v0.1.0 up to v1.0.3. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_35 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` [1.0.3]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v1.0.2...v1.0.3 [1.0.2]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v1.0.1...v1.0.2 [1.0.1]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v1.0.0...v1.0.1 [1.0.0]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v1.0.0-beta.10...v1.0.0 [1.0.0-beta.10]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v1.0.0-beta.9...v1.0.0-beta.10 [1.0.0-beta.9]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v1.0.0-beta.8...v1.0.0-beta.9 [1.0.0-beta.8]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v1.0.0-beta.7...v1.0.0-beta.8 [1.0.0-beta.7]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v1.0.0-beta.6...v1.0.0-beta.7 [1.0.0-beta.6]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v1.0.0-beta.5...v1.0.0-beta.6 [1.0.0-beta.5]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v1.0.0-beta.4...v1.0.0-beta.5 [1.0.0-beta.4]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v1.0.0-beta.3...v1.0.0-beta.4 [1.0.0-beta.3]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v1.0.0-beta.2...v1.0.0-beta.3 [1.0.0-beta.2]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v1.0.0-beta.1...v1.0.0-beta.2 [1.0.0-beta.1]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.7.4...v1.0.0-beta.1 [0.7.4]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.7.3...v0.7.4 [0.7.3]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.7.2...v0.7.3 [0.7.2]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.7.1...v0.7.2 [0.7.1]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.7.0...v0.7.1 [0.7.0]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.6.6...v0.7.0 [0.6.6]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.6.5...v0.6.6 [0.6.5]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.6.4...v0.6.5 [0.6.4]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.6.3...v0.6.4 [0.6.3]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.6.2...v0.6.3 [0.6.2]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.6.1...v0.6.2 [0.6.1]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.6.0...v0.6.1 [0.6.0]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.5.3...v0.6.0 [0.5.3]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.5.2...v0.5.3 [0.5.2]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.5.1...v0.5.2 [0.5.1]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.5.0...v0.5.1 [0.5.0]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.4.3...v0.5.0 [0.4.3]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.4.2...v0.4.3 [0.4.2]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.4.1...v0.4.2 [0.4.1]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.4.0...v0.4.1 [0.4.0]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.3.0...v0.4.0 [0.3.0]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.2.2...v0.3.0 [0.2.2]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.2.1...v0.2.2 [0.2.1]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.2.0...v0.2.1 [0.2.0]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.1.6...v0.2.0 [0.1.6]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.1.5...v0.1.6 [0.1.5]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.1.4...v0.1.5 [0.1.4]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.1.3...v0.1.4 [0.1.3]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.1.2...v0.1.3 [0.1.2]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.1.1...v0.1.2 [0.1.1]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v0.1.0...v0.1.1 [0.1.0]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/releases/tag/v0.1.0 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Version Comparison Links in Markdown DESCRIPTION: A series of markdown-formatted reference links that enable quick access to version comparisons between TailwindCSS releases. Each link follows the format [version]: URL where URL points to GitHub's compare view. SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_34 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` [2.2.19]: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/compare/v2.2.18...v2.2.19 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: TailwindCSS Version Tag DESCRIPTION: Version marker for release 2.0.0-alpha.25 with date SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_21 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## [2.0.0-alpha.25] - 2020-11-17 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: TailwindCSS Version Tag DESCRIPTION: Version marker for release 2.0.0-alpha.24 with date SOURCE: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_22 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## [2.0.0-alpha.24] -
